column4: im trying to install ubuntu 9.01 32bit, and it gets like 58 - 65% of the install and fails, it keeps saying to burn the disc at a lower speed, or the drive is bad... ive tried reburning, even at a slower speed, still fails... anyone got comments that may help overcome this issue
check if this cd have any error
what I am suggesting is if your pc so older than try Xubuntu
